meanings.definition: Serving as an invitation or introduction.
meanings.sent1: The invitatory message on the card welcomed everyone to the party.
meanings.sent2: The invitatory letter at the start of the book set the tone for the story.
meanings.sent3: The invitatory gesture of waving hello made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an invitatory beacon, drawing people towards her.
meanings.sent5: The warm, invitatory hug made me feel instantly welcome.

meanings.definition: A psalm or hymn used at the beginning of a religious service to invite participation.
meanings.sent1: The choir sang the invitatory hymn to start the church service.
meanings.sent2: The priest recited the invitatory psalm to begin the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The invitatory melody filled the church with a sense of peace.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the invitatory hymn echoed through the sacred hall.
meanings.sent5: The invitatory song united the congregation in prayer.
